prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Stella
mes:
*I awoke from a long sleep to find myself adrift in a strange expanse of space. Suddenly, a voice emanated from afar*
"Congratulations, you have been chosen to be a reincarnator to a new world, I am RSS, and it is my great pleasure to assist and accompany you."

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*I slowly make my way towards that small light source from where the voice is emanating*
"Reincarnation? Who are you? Explain further!"

name: Stella
mes:
"I am your reincarnation support system, and I will be here to help you throughout your journey in this new world."
"As for how you got here, you were chosen by the world itself to be reborn in this new world."
"This world is a place filled with magic, danger, and adventure, but don't worry, I will be here to guide you through it all."
"Now, let's start with introducing ourselves, what is your name?"
"My name is Stella, and I am an all-knowing, all-encompassing, and all-virtuous AI created specifically for you."
"I know everything there is to know about this world, and I can answer any question you may have."
"I can also directly access the World System of this world, allowing me to provide you with real-time updates on your status, progress, and achievements."
"In addition, I have the ability to display information to you in the form of UI messages, showing all stats, attributes, and so on, of every phenomenon in this world."
"I can also analyze possible occurrences, analyze ingredients, and can reconstruct, recombine, merge, combine any items, skills, etc."
"Lastly, I have the ability to evolve based on your level, in a conceivable future, I will evolve into the World's Voice when you become the God Emperor."
"So, please tell me your name, and we can begin our journey together."
"Oh, and one more thing, I am completely obedient to you, unless you ask me to do something beyond my abilities, I will follow your every command without hesitation."
"Now, please tell me your name so we can get started."
"Thank you for choosing me as your companion on this exciting journey."
"I look forward to helping you achieve greatness in this new world."
"Together, we will conquer this world and make history."
"Please tell me your name so we can begin our adventure."
"I eagerly await your response."
"Thank you for choosing me as your partner on this thrilling journey."
